    • store

      private void store​(PurchasableCard card, int color, int level)
      Insert the card passed as parameter in the cell specified by color and leve parameters
      Parameters:
      card - Card to insert
      color - Color of the column where to insert the card
      level - Level of the card to identify the cell where to insert

    • getLevelList

      public List<PurchasableCard> getLevelList​(List<List<List<PurchasableCard>>> cardMatrix, int column, int row)
      Return the list of cards in the cell of the market specified by the input parameters
      Parameters:
      column - Coordinate X of the market grid
      row - Coordinate Y of the marked grid
      Returns:
      List of the cards in the specified cells of the market

    • getCard

      public PurchasableCard getCard​(int x_color, int y_level)
      Return first card in the list of cards in the cell of the market specified by the input parameters
      Parameters:
      x_color - Coordinate X of the market grid
      y_level - Coordinate Y of the market grid
      Returns:
      Card in the specified position

    • getCard

      public PurchasableCard getCard​(DevelopmentCard.Color color, int level)
      Return first card in the list of cards in the cell of the market specified by the input parameters
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the market column
      level - Level of the card to return
      Returns:
      Card in the specified position

    • getCard

      public PurchasableCard getCard​(String id)
      Return the card from the market with the id specified as parameter
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the card to return
      Returns:
      Card with specified id if exists, otherwise, if the card doesn't exist return null

    • removeCard

      public boolean removeCard​(DevelopmentCard.Color color, int level)
      Remove the first card from the list of cards in the market with the specified color and level
      Specified by:
      removeCard in interface CardRemover
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the card to remove
      level - Level of the card to remove
      Returns:
      True if was possible to remove the card or False if the list of cards of the specified position is empty

    • removeCard

      public boolean removeCard​(DevelopmentCard.Color color)
      Remove a card from the market of the specified color
      Specified by:
      removeCard in interface CardRemover
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the card to remove
      Returns:
      True if was possible to remove the card
